title: idaya kadavai tirandaruL
sahitya:
idaya kadavai tirandaruL IshanE anbar nEshanE en


anupallavi

  padamalarE vAzhvin bhArattai vaikkavE sutantiramAga un sukhattinil shokkavE


caraNam 1    kArinai uluppiDum kATrinaip-pOlavE kamalattai malarndiDum kadiroLi pOlavE
 pUraNamAga un pUnkarattAlE puNNiyanE kAruNyanE en
    caraNam 2    iruL mAyam shei iruvinai naliyavE ihapara sukhaminda sahamellAm poliyavE
arutperum jyOti shuddhAnandam poliyavE anbul veLLam perugi Aruyir shezhikkavE
